meanings.definition: Abstaining from indulging in something, typically alcohol or food.
meanings.sent1: She was abstentious at the party and only drank water.
meanings.sent2: His abstentious nature helped him maintain a healthy diet.
meanings.sent3: The abstentious squirrel refused to eat the tempting acorns.
meanings.sent4: Her abstentious attitude towards shopping saved her a lot of money.
meanings.sent5: The abstentious monk lived a simple and disciplined life.

meanings.definition: Showing self-restraint or moderation in behavior.
meanings.sent1: The abstentious student resisted the urge to check their phone during class.
meanings.sent2: He displayed an abstentious approach to managing his time effectively.
meanings.sent3: The abstentious cat patiently waited for its owner to return home.
meanings.sent4: Her abstentious decision to save money for a trip paid off in the end.
meanings.sent5: The abstentious driver always obeyed the speed limit to ensure safety.
